weather.question: I fall from the sky and get you wet. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.

weather.question: I am hot and bright, and I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I am out.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?
I am cold and white and fall from the sky in the winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make snowballs with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I am around.

weather.question: I move the clouds and the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 You can feel me but can't see me.
🌬️ I can be gentle or strong.

weather.question: I am made of water, but I am in the air. You can’t see me clearly. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I am like a cloud on the ground.
🚗 You have to drive slowly when I am around.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spins around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can cause a lot of damage.
🏠 You should stay inside when I come.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I come with a loud noise.

weather.question: I am a loud crash after a flash of light. What am I?

hints.text: 👂 You can hear me from far away.

weather.question: I am a curved line of colors that appears after it rains, when the sun is shining. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I appear after a storm when the sun is visible.
✨ People say there is gold at the end of me.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am a very large animal.
🥜 I am known for enjoying peanuts.
🚿 I can use my nose as a shower.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in ponds. Who am I?
I am a big cat with a loud roar. I am known as the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane around my head.

animal.question: I hop around and have a pouch. I love to eat eucalyptus leaves. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌿 My babies live in my pouch.
🐾 I have strong legs for jumping.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and have no legs. Some of us are venomous. What am I?
I build dams and have big teeth. I like to chew on wood. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I live near rivers and lakes.
🏡 My home is made of sticks and mud.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots all over my body.
🍃 I eat leaves from acacia trees.

animal.question: I am a bird that cannot fly, but I can swim very well in the cold. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐧 I wear a black and white tuxedo.

animal.question: I am black and white with stripes, I look like a horse but I'm not. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐆 Lions and leopards like to hunt me
